job_history.work_description: Tested clients for drug use and referred them to other community resources. Produced media advisories, brochures, fact sheets, print ads and newsletters. Promoted healthy habits and practices in outreach materials and presentations. Charted and recorded information in client files. Tracked client movement on and off the unit by documenting times and destinations of clients. Traveled locally and regionally to conferences, workshops and presentations. Maintained up-to-date and comprehensive electronic and paper filing systems. Collaborated with local health departments and other community partners. Educated the public regarding community health resources in correctional facilities, community centers and churches. Drafted and revised reports, articles and background papers. Educated clients about treatment options and answered related questions. Checked facility for open windows, locked doors, malfunctioning smoke detectors and other safety hazards. Conducted outreach, advocacy and rehabilitative services for regular cases and crisis intervention.

Processed summons, subpoenas, appeals and motions. Drafted legal papers including complaints, summons and interrogatories. Gathered and analyzed research data regarding statutes, decisions, legal articles and codes. Investigated facts and law of cases using pertinent sources to determine causes of action and to prepare cases. Mailed and arranged for delivery of legal correspondence to clients, witnesses and court officials. Organized and maintained law libraries, documents and case files. Photocopied all correspondence, documents and other printed materials. Processed and distributed invoices to bill clients. Composed and revised legal documents, including letters, depositions and court documents. Created and tracked all expenses and client account codes. Recorded and monitored court appearance dates.

Established new customer accounts including checking, savings, lines of credit and loans. Processed sales referrals and promoted bank services and products. Balanced daily cash deposits and bank vault inventory with a zero error rate. Assembled in-store marketing displays. Processed cash withdrawals. Trained employees on cash drawer operation. Adhered to Wells Fargo security and audit procedures. Researched and resolved customer issues on personal savings, checking and lines of credit accounts. Examined checks for identification and endorsement. Supplied tellers with coin and currency as needed. Maintained confidentiality of bank records and client information. Directed specific questions to appropriate branch personnel. Delivered prompt, accurate and excellent customer service.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided excellent customer service as a Lead Teller, resolving customer issues and delivering prompt and accurate service, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with clients, witnesses, and court officials as a Municipal Court Clerk, and educated the public about community health resources as a Shelter Advocate, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Gathered and analyzed research data as a Municipal Court Clerk, and tracked client movement and client files as a Shelter Advocate, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Trained employees on cash drawer operation as a Lead Teller, and collaborated with local health departments and community partners as a Shelter Advocate, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed time as a Shelter Advocate, conducting outreach, advocacy, and rehabilitative services, and as a Lead Teller, processing sales referrals and promoting bank services, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Organizational Skills
skills.explanation: Maintained up-to-date and comprehensive electronic and paper filing systems as a Shelter Advocate, and organized and maintained law libraries, documents, and case files as a Municipal Court Clerk, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Banking Operations
skills.explanation: Processed sales referrals, promoted bank services, and balanced daily cash deposits and bank vault inventory with a zero error rate as a Lead Teller, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Legal Research
skills.explanation: Gathered and analyzed research data regarding statutes, decisions, legal articles, and codes as a Municipal Court Clerk, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Crisis Intervention
skills.explanation: Provided crisis intervention services as a Shelter Advocate, showing a solid level of proficiency.
